MESSAGE.value: changes to make mvn package work properly. still not final.
support for IDEA because the agent doesn't work in maven
support for IDEA, force the war stage to be skipped for plugins.
deal with requests by Maven to run the same Grails command with the same target and args.
remove the UAA library from Spring as it isn't in Apache Maven Central
a finer check to see if a phase is running twice with no parameters (e.g. compile)
make integration phase run integration and functional tests, make test phase run only unit tests. add in integration phase for plugins.
reformat to 2 spaces, the one true spacing.
reformat the plugin as at this stage we are giving up trying to merge with the main grails plugin line.
force the grails version that is in the environment to override the version of the bootstrap if same major revision

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: force the grails version that is in the environment to override the version of the bootstrap if same major revision
